# Government Tender Announcement

## Title
Reconstruction of Rooms 143 and 145 with Optional Rooms 009 and 010

## Reference Number
WS4337902774-Doc4339543476

## Tender Type
Request for Proposal

## Opening and Closing Dates
Publication Date: December 5, 2023
Tender Closing Date: January 10, 2024 (14:00:00)

## Tender Status
Expired

## Notice Details

* Solicitation Number: WS4337902774
* Amendment Number: 0
* Award Date: n/a
* Contract Start Date: January 8, 2024
* Contract End Date: January 7, 2026
* Regions of Opportunity: Ottawa

## Tender Details
Reconstruction services are required for Rooms 143 and 145 in the East Block. The work involves refitting the rooms, including the installation of drywall, ceilings, and ceiling moldings, painting, and installing electrical outlets and fixtures. The carpet will be provided by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC). The scope of work also includes the reconstruction of a small kitchenette, which will be rebuilt using materials provided by PSPC.

## Trade Agreements
This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Contact Information
Jonathan Bullard, SPAC/PSPC
jonathan.bullard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
